```{python}
#| label: fig-diff-ota-folded
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "The folded-cascode differential OTA (output common-mode regulation and biasing details are not shown)."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
sd.svgconfig.svg2 = False
with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2, fontsize=16)
    
    # cascode stage
    M5C = elm.AnalogNFet(offset_gate=False).drop('source').theta(0).label(r'$M_\mathrm{5C}$')
    elm.Line().down().length(d.unit/4)
    dot1 = elm.Dot()
    elm.Line().down().length(d.unit/2)
    M5 = elm.AnalogNFet(offset_gate=False).drop('source').theta(0).label('$M_5$', loc='left')
    elm.Line().down().length(d.unit/4)
    elm.Line().right().length(d.unit).dot()
    elm.Ground()

    elm.Line().right().length(d.unit)
    elm.Line().up().length(d.unit/4)
    M6 = elm.AnalogNFet(offset_gate=False).anchor('source').drop('drain').theta(0).label('$M_6$', loc='right').reverse()
    elm.Line().up().length(d.unit/4)
    dot2 = elm.Dot()
    elm.Line().up().length(d.unit/2)
    M6C = elm.AnalogNFet(offset_gate=False).anchor('source').theta(0).label(r'$M_\mathrm{6C}$', loc='right').reverse()

    elm.Line().up().at(M5C.drain).length(d.unit/4).dot()
    d.push()
    elm.Line().left().length(d.unit/2).dot(open=True).label(r'$V_\mathrm{out,p}$', loc='left')
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().up().length(d.unit/4)
    M3C = elm.AnalogPFet(offset_gate=False).anchor('drain').drop('source').theta(0).label(r'$M_\mathrm{3C}$')
    M3 = elm.AnalogPFet(offset_gate=False).anchor('drain').theta(0).label('$M_3$')

    elm.Line().up().at(M6C.drain).length(d.unit/4).dot()
    d.push()
    elm.Line().right().length(d.unit/2).dot(open=True).label(r'$V_\mathrm{out,n}$', 'right')
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().up().length(d.unit/4)
    M4C = elm.AnalogPFet(offset_gate=False).anchor('drain').drop('source').theta(0).label(r'$M_\mathrm{4C}$', loc='right').reverse()
    M4 = elm.AnalogPFet(offset_gate=False).anchor('drain').theta(0).label('$M_4$', loc='right').reverse()

    elm.Line().at(M3.gate).to(M4.gate).label(r'$V_\mathrm{bias4}$')
    elm.Line().at(M5C.gate).to(M6C.gate).label(r'$V_\mathrm{bias2}$')
    elm.Line().at(M3C.gate).to(M4C.gate).label(r'$V_\mathrm{bias3}$')
    elm.Line().at(M5.gate).to(M6.gate).label(r'$V_\mathrm{bias1}$')

    # differential input pair
    elm.Line().left().at(dot1.start).length(d.unit*3)
    elm.Line().up().length(d.unit/4)
    M2 = elm.AnalogPFet(offset_gate=False).anchor('drain').theta(0).drop('source').label('$M_2$')
    elm.Line().up().length(d.unit/4)
    elm.Line().left().length(d.unit*3/4).dot()
    d.push()
    elm.Line().up().length(d.unit/2)
    Ibias = elm.SourceI().up().label(r'$I_\mathrm{bias}$').reverse()
    line1 = elm.Line().up().toy(M3.source)
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().left().length(d.unit*3/4)
    elm.Line().down().length(d.unit/4)
    M1 = elm.AnalogPFet(offset_gate=False).anchor('source').theta(0).drop('drain').label('$M_1$', loc='right').reverse()
    elm.Line().down().toy(dot2.end) 
    elm.Line().right().to(dot2.end)
    
    elm.Line().left().at(M1.gate).length(d.unit/4).dot(open=True).label(r'$V_\mathrm{in,p}$', 'left') 
    elm.Line().right().at(M2.gate).length(d.unit/4).dot(open=True).label(r'$V_\mathrm{in,n}$', 'right') 

    # vdd line
    elm.Line().at((line1.end[0]-d.unit/4, line1.end[1])).to((M4.source[0]+d.unit/4, M4.source[1])).label(r'$V_\mathrm{DD}$').linewidth(3)
```
